Tariffs" main_style="style-2" tooltip_text="Click to Open in New Tab" undefined="" box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" hover_box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" buttom_link_src="url:https%3A%2F%2Faaiila.org%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2025%2F06%2FTariffs.pdf||target:%20_blank|" title_font_options="font_size:20" tutorials=""][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_button button_text="Presenter's Slides - Markets" main_style="style-2" tooltip_text="Click to Open in New Tab" undefined="" box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" hover_box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" buttom_link_src="url:https%3A%2F%2Faaiila.org%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2025%2F06%2FMarkets_Apr25.pdf||target:%20_blank|" title_font_options="font_size:20" tutorials=""][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]Dr. Charles Lieberman is a founding member and serves as chief investment officer for Advisors Capital Management LLC., and independent money management and investment advisory firm. The firm is responsible for managing more than $10 billion in assets, and servicing financial advisors and private clients throughout the country. Dr. Lieberman has overall responsibility for managing its separate account portfolios. Charles is a graduate of MIT with a bachelors in economics, and earned his Ph.D in economics from the University of Pennsylvania. Dr. Lieberman is frequently quoted in the media, appearing often on CNBC, Bloomberg radio and TV, CNN, Fox Business News, and the major television networks.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_heading subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2" subtitle_font_options="tag:div"]Trump, Tariffs and the Economic and Investment Outlook[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]Charles plans to talk about the state of the economy and to distinguish between market fears and likely reality. As just seen, markets tend to overreact when there are negative things happening, like tariffs and military conflicts, but less negative outcomes are vastly more likely. It is absolutely normal for markets to overreact to this kind of turmoil. But as clarity emerges on tariffs, the market should rebound. Valuations are commonly described as high, but Charles will show why this is wrong.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]
Attend this talk and learn...
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" team_member_description="" icon_size="15" team_member_photo="17566" title_font_options="tag:div|font_size:24|line_height:40|font_style_bold:1" subtitle_font_options="tag:div|font_size:16|color:%2334d288|line_height:24|font_style_bold:1"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][vc_column_text]

ARCHIVE MATERIALS

[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][dfd_button button_text="Webinar Recording" main_style="style-2" tooltip_text="Click to Open in New Tab" buttom_link_src="url:https%3A%2F%2Fcommunity.aaii.com%2FHigherLogic%2FSystem%2FDownloadDocumentFile.ashx%3FDocumentFileKey%3D179700c9-6aed-3989-cf6f-8d9a17386096%26forceDialog%3D0||target:%20_blank|" undefined="" box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" hover_box_shadow="box_shadow_enable:disable|shadow_horizontal:0|shadow_vertical:15|shadow_blur:50|shadow_spread:0|box_shadow_color:rgba(0%2C0%2C0%2C0.35)" title_font_options="font_size:20"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="40" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="30" screen_tablet_spacer_size="20" screen_mobile_spacer_size="15"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]Adam Parker brings 20 years of experience in equities, including four years on the buy side and 18 years on sell side to Trivector Research. Prior to Trivector Research, Adam was the founder and lead portfolio manager of Trivector Capital, an equity long/short hedge fund. From 2017-2019 Adam worked as the Director of Quantitative Strategy at Eminence Capital, reporting to the CEO and Founder. In this role, he was responsible for building a quantitative infrastructure to conduct analysis around single stock research; risk management; diagnostics of prior trades to improving sizing and timing; and macro research. Between 2010 and early 2017, Adam was the Chief US Equity Strategist and Director of Global Quantitative Research at Morgan Stanley, where he was acknowledged as a top strategist and quantitative researcher multiple times by Institutional Investor magazine and named the #1 Strategist by portfolio managers in Greenwich Associates’ Greenwich Survey. Adam was a member of Morgan Stanley’s Global Investment Committee, a seven-person group responsible for asset allocation recommendations for the firm’s $2 trillion private wealth network. Prolific in publishing research, Adam co-authored a ground-breaking paper on gender diversity as a risk factor. In addition to developing equity models and risk management tools, he managed a long-only paper portfolio of approximately 50 US stocks that was published on a weekly basis and strongly outperformed the market over six years. In the weekly Global Macro Forum he ran, Adam shared his research and insights on key macro issues with colleagues and clients. From June 1999 to August 2010, Adam worked at Sanford C. Bernstein & Co., which he joined as a Junior Quantitative Researcher. Quickly promoted to the role of fundamental US semiconductor analyst in 2001, Adam was the #1 Institutional Investor-ranked semiconductor analyst from 2004-2006. In 2007, he was promoted to the role of Global Director of Research, responsible for attracting, hiring and retaining key talent in New York and London. In 2008, Adam took over as the US Equity Strategist and Global Director of Quantitative Research, where he was again recognized by both Institutional Investor and the Greenwich Survey as a top strategist and quantitative researcher. Adam holds a Ph.D. in Statistics from Boston University, an MS in Biostatistics from the University of North Carolina in Chapel Hill and a BS in Statistics from the University of Michigan in Ann Arbor.[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="40" screen_tablet_spacer_size="30" screen_mobile_spacer_size="20"][dfd_heading subtitle="" delimiter_settings="delimiter_style:solid|delimiter_width:0|delimiter_height:1" undefined="" title_font_options="tag:h2" subtitle_font_options="tag:div"]Empowering Wealth Creation: Unlocking Actionable U.S. Stock Market Insights with Trivector Research[/dfd_heading][vc_column_text]
In this presentation, Adam Parker will explore how Trivector Research equips individual investors with data-driven tools to navigate the U.S. stock market confidently. Adam will dive into his proprietary, empirical evidence-based insights, which distills complex financial data into clear, actionable strategies. Attendees will learn how to cut through market noise, enhance investment conviction, and deliver transparent, objective analysis tailored for wealth managers and individual investors like you. Join us to discover how Trivector’s rigorous approach can empower your investment decisions.
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][vc_column_text]
Attend this talk and learn...
[/vc_column_text][dfd_spacer screen_wide_spacer_size="20" screen_normal_resolution="1024" screen_tablet_resolution="800" screen_mobile_resolution="480" screen_normal_spacer_size="15" screen_tablet_spacer_size="15" screen_mobile_spacer_size="10"][dfd_icon_list module_animation="transition.slideRightBigIn" WEBINAR ACCESS INFORMATION

 

Prepay $15 for the Webinar

 
First-time Guests may attend free, but must contact the Assistant Webmaster at aaiilaasstwebmaster@gmail.com to inform him that you are a First-time Guest and give your name and email address
 
THIS PURCHASE SITE WILL CLOSE ON FRIDAY, June 20 AT 6 PM.
CLICK HERE TO PREPAY FOR THE WEBINAR MEETING
 
Please Note:
(1) A webinar registration link for this event will be emailed to payees on two dates: Friday, June 13, and Friday, June 20, after 6:00 pm.
(2) Annual Pass Holders will receive a "name tag pass" at the HOTEL Angeleno at each of the 2 HOTEL Angeleno meetings, and will also receive an email with the registration link for all 10 Webinar meetings.  You will have the choice of viewing the Webinar on screen or attending the HOTEL Angeleno in person. Your annual pass gives you access to HOTEL Angeleno or the Webinar for each of the two combo HOTEL Angeleno/Webinar events.

item.excerpt:encoded: Financial Education meeting information that focuses on the broad overview of basic individual investing in today's market.
